name: CivicGraph
description: A versioning data store for time-variant graph data
author: Aditya Mukhopadhyay

snapshot-intervals.description: The interval (number of command hops) between two consecutive snapshots. This can be specified per-collection, apart from a default fallback.

event-coll-suffix.description: The suffix of the (vertex) collection where events are stored.

snapshot-coll-suffix.description: The suffix of the (vertex) collection where snapshots are stored.

command-coll-suffix.description: The suffix of the (edge) collection where commands are stored.

event-snapshot-link-coll-suffix.description: The suffix of the (edge) collection where event-snapshot links are stored.

snapshot-link-coll-suffix.description: The suffix of the (edge) collection where snapshot links are stored.

skeleton-vertex-coll-suffix.description: The suffix of the (vertex) collection where structural vertices are stored.

skeleton-edge-hub-coll-suffix.description: The suffix of the (vertex) collection where structural edge hubs are stored.

skeleton-edge-spoke-coll-suffix.description: The suffix of the (edge) collection where structural edge spokes are stored.

skeleton-graph-update-batch-size.description: The maximum number of skeleton nodes to write on each job run.
